nodes.bodyText: Should we use List or array?
Trying to understand what this host_infos is about. Can you elaborate a bit?

I think both of ResourceType and OperationType belong to GoalStateJsonSB between DPM and ACA, so we could safely remove them from this class.
We could use the REST Method (GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE) to determine the operation type.
GoalState implies to that this is a "full" state, which might or might not be. Let us use a more generic name like "NetworkConfiguration".
Let us not inherit from CustomerResource as not all fields are customer fields.
A side topic: I think we should remove alcor/common/constants/Common.java, which is an auto-generated protobuf file from schema/proto3/common.java.
I think we could use an antation @DaTa, and remove all the setter and getter.
An example is https://github.com/futurewei-cloud/alcor/blob/master/web/src/main/java/com/futurewei/alcor/web/entity/port/PortEntity.java
Use @DaTa.
The field "Routers" is gone. Please add it back.
I think you changed this to List<> in other PR already.
With @DaTa enabled, the setter and getter could be removed, in theory. Is it not the case here?
Please change it to a list of neighbor_info per our offline discussion.
See if @DaTa could help remove those getters and setters.
Do you need host_mac?

Do you think making this as a list is a good idea?
May be it will help us group by host later.

For every new files, please configure your IDE to automatically insert our license statement.
An example: https://github.com/futurewei-cloud/alcor/blob/master/web/src/main/java/com/futurewei/alcor/web/entity/port/PortEntity.java
